20 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_FWD_H__INCLUDED

23 #include <complex>
24 
25 namespace Eigen { // fwd define Eigen's aligned allocator for
26  // TiledArray::Tensor
27 template <class>
28 class aligned_allocator;
29 } // namespace Eigen
30 
31 namespace TiledArray {
32 
33 // Ranges
34 class TiledRange1;
35 class TiledRange;
36 
37 // TiledArray Policy
38 class DensePolicy;
39 class SparsePolicy;
40 
41 // TiledArray Tensors
42 template <typename, typename>
43 class Tensor;
44 
45 typedef Tensor<double, Eigen::aligned_allocator<double> > TensorD;
46 typedef Tensor<int, Eigen::aligned_allocator<int> > TensorI;
47 typedef Tensor<float, Eigen::aligned_allocator<float> > TensorF;
48 typedef Tensor<long, Eigen::aligned_allocator<long> > TensorL;
49 typedef Tensor<std::complex<double>,
50  Eigen::aligned_allocator<std::complex<double> > >
51  TensorZ;
52 typedef Tensor<std::complex<float>,
53  Eigen::aligned_allocator<std::complex<float> > >
54  TensorC;
55 
56 // TiledArray Arrays
57 template <typename, typename>
58 class DistArray;
59 
60 // Dense Array Typedefs
61 template <typename T>
62 using TArray = DistArray<Tensor<T, Eigen::aligned_allocator<T> >, DensePolicy>;
63 typedef TArray<double> TArrayD;
64 typedef TArray<int> TArrayI;
65 typedef TArray<float> TArrayF;
66 typedef TArray<long> TArrayL;
67 typedef TArray<std::complex<double> > TArrayZ;
68 typedef TArray<std::complex<float> > TArrayC;
69 
70 // Sparse Array Typedefs
71 template <typename T>
72 using TSpArray =
73  DistArray<Tensor<T, Eigen::aligned_allocator<T> >, SparsePolicy>;
74 typedef TSpArray<double> TSpArrayD;
75 typedef TSpArray<int> TSpArrayI;
76 typedef TSpArray<float> TSpArrayF;
77 typedef TSpArray<long> TSpArrayL;
78 typedef TSpArray<std::complex<double> > TSpArrayZ;
79 typedef TSpArray<std::complex<float> > TSpArrayC;
80 
81 // type alias for backward compatibility: the old Array has static type,
82 // DistArray is rank-polymorphic
83 template <typename T, unsigned int = 0,
84  typename Tile = Tensor<T, Eigen::aligned_allocator<T> >,
85  typename Policy = DensePolicy>
86 using Array = DistArray<Tile, Policy>;
87 
88 } // namespace TiledArray
